content.raw: Returns the user-specified prior vector corresponding to the coordinates in `virtual_evidence_coords`. Then from my understanding, `supercontig_coords_labels` \(should have a better name, sorry\) returns a list \(or generator?\) of tuples of format ‘VE label start, VE label end, prior vector in this segment’ for which VE label start and VE label end segments contained within start,end.
content.html: Returns the user-specified prior vector corresponding to the coordinates in virtual_evidence_coords. Then from my understanding, supercontig_coords_labels (should have a better name, sorry) returns a list (or generator?) of tuples of format ‘VE label start, VE label end, prior vector in this segment’ for which VE label start and VE label end segments contained within start,end.
